body_html:
There may be exceptions, but our goal is nothing outside of contrib should depend on anything under contrib.
I think nccl is one of the exceptions we have. But that is OK because for GPUs we maintain our crosstool files (not sure for windows GPU).

@meteorcloudy is it possible for us to create a crosstool file that inherits from core bazel crosstool files?
We do not need to maintain most of the CPU crosstools, but such things come up every now and then where things can be fixed with a single line added to the crosstool file.
